contest-event.event-date: March 5, 1955 D Midlands Area (Fourth Section) Midlands Area (Fourth Section) 40 Test Piece Contest Midlands Area midlands-area-fourth-section National Championship of Great Britain (Fourth Section Final) From 1985 to 1993 this contest was split into North and South Areas. Please refer to the 'Old Contests' section on http://brassbandresults.co.uk/contests/MIDLANDS-AREA/ for the results. Midlands Fourth Midsummer Eve De Montfort Hall, Leicester, Leicestershire, England, UK 14 bands competed.
